content: And despite a decrease in automobile production and unit sales due to semiconductor shortages and rising raw material prices, operating profit increased Â¥11.2 billion, reaching Â¥453.4 billion due to price increases commensurate with enhanced product value and reduced incentives as well as increased motorcycle unit sales and currency impact. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much.
